## DDNS

> IPIP

### 

1. 
	(https://wanwang.aliyun.com/domain/com?spm=5176.8142029.388261.128.anTrkC)

2. IPACNAME
	![image](http://www.uthinks.com:8081/resource/picture/ddns1.png)

### 

> pythonPython

1. IP

		import urllib2

		def getIp():
    		try:
        		ip = visit("http://www.ip138.com/ip2city.asp")
    		except:
        		ip = "failed to get internet ip"
    		return ip

		def visit(url):
    		req = urllib2.Request(url)
    		opener = urllib2.urlopen(req)
    		result = opener.read()
    		return result[result.find('[') + 1: result.find(']')]

2. alidns python SDK
(https://develop.aliyun.com/sdk/java?spm=5176.doc29772.416540.246.rjauTQ)

3. 
sudo python setup.py install

4. alidns python SDK
pip install aliyun-python-sdk-alidns

5. 1IPAPIDNS

		import json

		from aliyunsdkalidns.request.v20150109 import UpdateDomainRecordRequest,DescribeDomainRecordsRequest, \
    		DescribeDomainRecordInfoRequest, AddDomainRecordRequest
		from aliyunsdkcore import client

		# 
		def updateDns(accessKey, accessKeySecret, hostRecord, dnsType, dnsValue, dnsRecordid, dnsTtl, returnFormat):
    		print hostRecord, dnsType, dnsValue, dnsRecordid, dnsTtl, returnFormat
    		clt = client.AcsClient(accessKey, accessKeySecret, 'cn-hangzhou')
    		request = UpdateDomainRecordRequest.UpdateDomainRecordRequest()
    		request.set_RR(hostRecord)
    		request.set_Type(dnsType)
    		request.set_Value(dnsValue)
    		request.set_RecordId(dnsRecordid)
    		request.set_TTL(dnsTtl)
    		request.set_accept_format(returnFormat)
    		result = clt.do_action(request)
    		return result

		# IP
		def getDnsIp(accessKey, accessKeySecret, dnsRecordid, returnFormat):
    		clt = client.AcsClient(accessKey, accessKeySecret, 'cn-hangzhou')
    		request = DescribeDomainRecordInfoRequest.DescribeDomainRecordInfoRequest()
    		request.set_accept_format(returnFormat)
    		request.set_RecordId(dnsRecordid)
    		result = clt.do_action(request)
    		result = json.JSONDecoder().decode(result)
    		result = result['Value']
    		return result

6. 
	![image](http://www.uthinks.com:8081/resource/picture/portDispatch.png)

7. crontab

	*/1 * * * * /usr/bin/python /home/bill/basic/BasicTask.py

### 

1. accessKeyaccessKeySecret
	(https://ak-console.aliyun.com/#/accesskey)

2. RecoreId

		# dns_domain  uthinks.com
		def check_records(dnsDomain):
    		clt = client.AcsClient(accessKeyId, accessKeySecret, 'cn-hangzhou')
    		request = DescribeDomainRecordsRequest.DescribeDomainRecordsRequest()
    		request.set_DomainName(dnsDomain)
    		request.set_accept_format('json')
    		result = clt.do_action(request)
    		print result
    		return result

    	
    	{
    		"PageNumber": 1,
    		"TotalCount": 2,
    		"PageSize": 20,
    		"RequestId": "***",
    		"DomainRecords": {
        		"Record": [
            		{
                		"RR": "*",
                		"Status": "ENABLE",
               		 	"Value": "****",
                		"RecordId": "****",
                		"Type": "A",
                		"DomainName": "uthinks.com",
                		"Locked": false,
                		"Line": "default",
                		"TTL": "600"
            		},
               ]
    		}
		}

Post.content:
1. 3B190 + = 216 ECS
  3. www.uthinks.com
  4. ip20MIPIP

  1. https://www.raspberrypi.org/downloads/

  2. SDwindowswin32diskimager
    (http://download.csdn.net/detail/longerzone/7574047)

  3. win32diskimagerSD > win32diskimager > > SD

  4. windowsSD100MLinux bootLinux ext4 Windows

  5. SDSD

  1. ssh
    sshdHDMIsudo raspi-config
    sshenableok

DDNS

IPIP


  1. (https://wanwang.aliyun.com/domain/com?spm=5176.8142029.388261.128.anTrkC)

  2. IPACNAME

pythonPython

  1. IP

    import urllib2

def getIp():
    try:
        ip = visit("http://www.ip138.com/ip2city.asp")
    except:
        ip = "failed to get internet ip"
    return ip

def visit(url):
    req = urllib2.Request(url)
    opener = urllib2.urlopen(req)
    result = opener.read()
    return result[result.find('[') + 1: result.find(']')]

  2. alidns python SDK
    (https://develop.aliyun.com/sdk/java?spm=5176.doc29772.416540.246.rjauTQ)


  3. sudo python setup.py install

  4. alidns python SDK
    pip install aliyun-python-sdk-alidns

  5. 1IPAPIDNS

    import json

from aliyunsdkalidns.request.v20150109 import UpdateDomainRecordRequest,DescribeDomainRecordsRequest, \
    DescribeDomainRecordInfoRequest, AddDomainRecordRequest
from aliyunsdkcore import client

# 
def updateDns(accessKey, accessKeySecret, hostRecord, dnsType, dnsValue, dnsRecordid, dnsTtl, returnFormat):
    print hostRecord, dnsType, dnsValue, dnsRecordid, dnsTtl, returnFormat
    clt = client.AcsClient(accessKey, accessKeySecret, 'cn-hangzhou')
    request = UpdateDomainRecordRequest.UpdateDomainRecordRequest()
    request.set_RR(hostRecord)
    request.set_Type(dnsType)
    request.set_Value(dnsValue)
    request.set_RecordId(dnsRecordid)
    request.set_TTL(dnsTtl)
    request.set_accept_format(returnFormat)
    result = clt.do_action(request)
    return result

# IP
def getDnsIp(accessKey, accessKeySecret, dnsRecordid, returnFormat):
    clt = client.AcsClient(accessKey, accessKeySecret, 'cn-hangzhou')
    request = DescribeDomainRecordInfoRequest.DescribeDomainRecordInfoRequest()
    request.set_accept_format(returnFormat)
    request.set_RecordId(dnsRecordid)
    result = clt.do_action(request)
    result = json.JSONDecoder().decode(result)
    result = result['Value']
    return result


  7. crontab

    /1 * /usr/bin/python /home/bill/basic/BasicTask.py

  1. accessKeyaccessKeySecret
    (https://ak-console.aliyun.com/#/accesskey)

  2. RecoreId

    # dns_domain  uthinks.com
def check_records(dnsDomain):
    clt = client.AcsClient(accessKeyId, accessKeySecret, 'cn-hangzhou')
    request = DescribeDomainRecordsRequest.DescribeDomainRecordsRequest()
    request.set_DomainName(dnsDomain)
    request.set_accept_format('json')
    result = clt.do_action(request)
    print result
    return result


{
    "PageNumber": 1,
    "TotalCount": 2,
    "PageSize": 20,
    "RequestId": "***",
    "DomainRecords": {
        "Record": [
            {
                "RR": "*",
                "Status": "ENABLE",
                    "Value": "****",
                "RecordId": "****",
                "Type": "A",
                "DomainName": "uthinks.com",
                "Locked": false,
                "Line": "default",
                "TTL": "600"
            },
       ]
    }
}

    import json

from aliyunsdkalidns.request.v20150109 import UpdateDomainRecordRequest,DescribeDomainRecordsRequest, \

from aliyunsdkcore import client

def updateDns(accessKey, accessKeySecret, hostRecord, dnsType, dnsValue, dnsRecordid, dnsTtl, returnFormat):

    request = UpdateDomainRecordRequest.UpdateDomainRecordRequest()
    request.set_RR(hostRecord)
    request.set_Type(dnsType)
    request.set_Value(dnsValue)
    request.set_RecordId(dnsRecordid)
    request.set_TTL(dnsTtl)
    request.set_accept_format(returnFormat)
    result = clt.do_action(request)
    return result

    clt = client.AcsClient(accessKey, accessKeySecret, 'cn-hangzhou')
    request = DescribeDomainRecordInfoRequest.DescribeDomainRecordInfoRequest()
    request.set_accept_format(returnFormat)
    request.set_RecordId(dnsRecordid)
    result = clt.do_action(request)
    result = json.JSONDecoder().decode(result)
    result = result['Value']
    return result

Post.title: Hexo + Git + Nginx
Post.content:
,


1.
(http://www.uthinks.xyz/2017/01/23/RaspberryPi-init/)

  2. GitGitGitHud
  3. Nginx
  4. HexoHexo
    (http://luckykun.com/work/2016-04-23/heoll-hexo.html)

Git

  1. Gitssh

    sudo apt-get install wget git-core

  2. gitLinux

    adduser git
passwd git

  3. gitGit

    cd /home/git
mkdir blog
cd blog
git init --bare

  4. blog, masterhexo

    git clone git@[ | IP]:/home/git/blog

  5. git

  1. Gitgit init git init bare
    (http://blog.csdn.net/feizxiang3/article/details/8065506)

Nginx

  1. nginx

    sudo apt-get install nginx

  2. nginx /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

    user www-data;
worker_processes 4;
pid /run/nginx.pid;

events {
    worker_connections 768;
    # multi_accept on;
}

http {
        server {
                  listen  8081;
                  # hexogit
                  location / {
                          root   /home/bill/blog/public;
                        index  index.html;
                  }

                  # git
                  location ~ ^/resource/picture/(.*)? {
                     alias /home/bill/resource/picture/$1 ;
                      add_header Cache-control max-age=7200,s-maxage=3600;
                  }
          }

        ##
        # Basic Settings
        ##

        sendfile on;
        tcp_nopush on;
        tcp_nodelay on;
        keepalive_timeout 65;
        types_hash_max_size 2048;
        # server_tokens off;

        # server_names_hash_bucket_size 64;
        # server_name_in_redirect off;

        include /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type application/octet-stream;

        ##
        # SSL Settings
        ##

        ssl_protocols TLSv1 TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2; # Dropping SSLv3, ref: POODLE
        ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on;

        ##
        # Logging Settings
        ##

        access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log;
        error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log;

        ##
        # Gzip Settings
        ##

        gzip on;
        gzip_disable "msie6";

        # gzip_vary on;
        # gzip_proxied any;
        # gzip_comp_level 6;
        # gzip_buffers 16 8k;
        # gzip_http_version 1.1;
        # gzip_types text/plain text/css application/json application/javascript text/xml application/xml application/xml+rss text/javascript;

        ##
        # Virtual Host Configs
        ##

        include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;
        include /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/*;
}

  3. nginx

    sudo /etc/init.d/nginx start | restart | stop

Gitnginx

1.GitHudhexo
(http://luckykun.com/work/2016-04-23/heoll-hexo.html)

2.

  • git pull

    import os

    if name == main:

    #blog
os.chdir('/home/bill/blog/')
os.system('git pull origin master')

#
os.chdir('/home/bill/resource/')
os.system('git pull origin master')

  • crontab -e

    */1 * * * * /usr/bin/python /home/bill/deploy/deploy.py

  2. nginx /etc/nginx/nginx.conf

events {
    worker_connections 768;

http {

                  }

        ##

        ##

        sendfile on;
        tcp_nopush on;

        keepalive_timeout 65;
